backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing chatrooms, messages, reactions, user profiles, active user tracking, and access control with storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two Giphy‑related features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing functionality of all major frontend components, hooks, pages, and configuration files.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, global layout, 404 handling, theming, and conditional footer visibility on chatroom pages.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Avatar picker dialog supporting image upload, removal, and Giphy GIF search/selection with debounced queries and update mutations.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Chat area component handling message list rendering, auto‑scroll, replies, pinned video display, and collapsible header logic.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with media thumbnails and live status, including YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter preview handling.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Modal for creating a chatroom with fields for topic, description, category, and media upload or URL validation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with navigation, username editing, and avatar picker access.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: No-op component that renders nothing because authentication is disabled.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders chat messages with reactions, media previews, pinning, reply handling, and optional Twitter embeds.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Input area for sending messages with support for media attachments, video URLs, Twitter links, and voice recording.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Displays a pinned YouTube or Twitch video with an option to unpin it.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: Audio message player component with waveform visualization, playback controls, and time tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Hook returning a debounced version of a value after a delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication state, login, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating chatrooms, messages, profiles, and reactions via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with CSS variables for light/dark themes and global layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utility for formatting numbers into compact notation like k, M, and B.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Functions for searching the Giphy API and mapping results into GIF preview objects.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty placeholder file for html2canvas loader logic.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty placeholder file for Twitter embed rendering logic.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches and caches Twitter oEmbed previews, extracting text, author info, and images without full DOM parsing.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Implements a localStorage cache for Twitter oEmbed previews with versioning, validation, and expiration handling.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty placeholder file for Twitter thumbnail utilities.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty placeholder file for Twitter thumbnail caching logic.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Provides helpers to extract IDs from YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter URLs and generate corresponding thumbnail or embed URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Loads a single chatroom, handles view count incrementing, and displays loading or error states before rendering ChatArea.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Displays the chatroom lobby with search, category filtering, and chatroom creation dialog, managing related state and queries.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project state and requirements for redoing Giphy avatar support without affecting existing UI layout.
